Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: The agent-delete command attempts to delete an agent.
The command is a confirmed command.

FormalItem.title: Example
FormalItem.Verbatim:
[northpike]$ agent-delete --id bbb05afd-07e8-4dad-a86e-79ed0dbf5487 Confirmation required; this is a destructive operation that cannot be undone.
To confirm this operation, please enter:
agent-delete-confirm f44c6550-0850-42a2-a324-bc5294029c3e
[northpike]$ agent-delete-confirm f44c6550-0850-42a2-a324-bc5294029c3e
